title: Can you charge Oculus Quest while using it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not sure what you mean exactly by “the” Oculus as there are multiple different varieties out now. The Oculus Rifts are a corded headset plugged into your computer so they will always be powered as long as your computer is on. If you’re referring to an Oculus Quest yes, you can charge while playing but it kind of defeats the purpose of having a wireless VR headset (unless you’re just using it for development purposes then it might make sense) Not sure about the Oculus Go as I do not own one.

Yes, you can charge it while using it and if you’re planning to use it for more than 2–3 hours straight, you’ll need to charge it. There are several mobile charging solutions available so you can take your charging pack with you instead of being tied to an outlet, don’t worry!
